channel.title: Meta Mesh Wireless Communities
channel.description: Recent content on Meta Mesh Wireless Communities

item.title: Every1online: What To Know
item.description: By now, you’ve likely heard the exciting news: Meta Mesh Wireless Communities is now a wireless internet service provider.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This page contains: Our Privacy Statement Collection of your Personal Information: Website Users Map Terms of Service

item.title: Every1online
item.description: Meta Mesh Wireless Communities is proud to announce our In-Home WiFi pilot project Every1online: Internet Access for three in-need Pittsburgh Communities: Homewood, Coraopolis, and New Kensington-Arnold.

item.title: Works
item.description: The Meta Mesh Network uses different strategies to address different neighborhood or event needs–basically, we wear many hats.

item.title: How to Help
item.description: As a nonprofit, there are three main ways that we can continue to provide deeply needed Internet services to underserved communities for a low cost:

item.title: Learn More
item.description: Additional Reading We strive to be transparent by the public, regardless of their base knowledge of WiFi or networking, can understand our mission.

item.title: Who We Are
item.description: Meta Mesh Wireless Communities is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit Wireless Internet Service Provider. Since 2015, we’ve worked to bridge the Digital Divide in the Greater Pittsburgh area by helping those who are unable to get Internet access due to monetary or geographical barriers.

item.title: Meta Mesh Blog
item.description: Every1online: What To Know By Brian Conway By now, you’ve likely heard the exciting news: Meta Mesh Wireless Communities is now a wireless internet service provider.

item.title: Press Coverage
item.description: Executive Director Transition Feb. 23, 2021 Meta Mesh Wireless Communities (MMWC) has grown to become Pittsburgh’s premier community network builder since its founding in 2013.

item.title: Thank You for your Submission
item.description: Hello! We have received your sign-up information for Every1online, a residential WiFi pilot program. Construction for this project is well underway.
